header.relationships: Close family, partners, very close friends
header.topics: Communication in languages, phone number/calls, medical bills/ hospitals, public transport/ walking, photocopying, printing, areas/ places, seatbelts/ car crashes,
header.activity: Father and daughter converse on the way to pick up granddad at the hospital
